TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AudioEffect extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: AudioEffect is the base class for controlling audio effects provided by the android audio framework.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Intent to signal to the effect control application or service that an audio session is closed and that effects should not be applied anymore.
